titles.title: You Make Me Lie Down in Green Pastures

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You make me lie down
In green pastures
You make me wanting for nothing
You fill my hunger
With honey from your sweet sweet word

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You let me worship before you
So I will love you and adore you
You are my Shepherd
You are my Jesus
You are my Lord
